column4: hi guys..i've a problem : on ubuntu 8.10, I'm running google Adwords editor using Wine. When I open big campaigns, the application just closes without any error message. Any idea what i should be checking ?
okay, you need to go to where the .exe file is stored and run wine ./blablalba.exe, this will output error messages in the terminal. Those are your error messages :)
also check the appdb and #winehq are great on getting windows apps to work with wine
